trans-unit.source: Push notifications are normally sent in a back-end service like Mobile Services or ASP.NET using a compatible library.
trans-unit.target: Push notifications are normally sent in a back-end service like Mobile Services or ASP.NET using a compatible library.

trans-unit.source: You can also use the REST API directly to send notification messages if a library is not available for your back-end.
trans-unit.target: You can also use the REST API directly to send notification messages if a library is not available for your back-end.

trans-unit.source: Here is a list of some other tutorials you may want to review for sending notifications:
trans-unit.target: Here is a list of some other tutorials you may want to review for sending notifications:

trans-unit.source: Azure Mobile Services : For an example of how to send notifications from an Azure Mobile Services backend integrated with Notification Hubs, see [Get started with push notifications in Mobile Services].
trans-unit.target: Azure Mobile Services : For an example of how to send notifications from an Azure Mobile Services backend integrated with Notification Hubs, see [Get started with push notifications in Mobile Services].

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET : [Use Notification Hubs to push notifications to users].
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET : [Use Notification Hubs to push notifications to users].

trans-unit.source: Azure Notification Hub Java SDK: See <link><linkText>How to use Notification Hubs from Java</linkText><title></title></link> for sending notifications from Java.
trans-unit.target: Azure Notification Hub Java SDK: See <link><linkText>How to use Notification Hubs from Java</linkText><title></title></link> for sending notifications from Java.

trans-unit.source: This has been tested in Eclipse for Android Development.
trans-unit.target: This has been tested in Eclipse for Android Development.

trans-unit.source: PHP: <link><linkText>How to use Notification Hubs from PHP</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: PHP: <link><linkText>How to use Notification Hubs from PHP</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: In this next section of the tutorial, you will learn how to use the <link><linkText>Notification Hub REST interface</linkText><title></title></link> to send the notification message directly in your app.
trans-unit.target: In this next section of the tutorial, you will learn how to use the <link><linkText>Notification Hub REST interface</linkText><title></title></link> to send the notification message directly in your app.

trans-unit.source: All registered devices receive the notification sent by any device.
trans-unit.target: All registered devices receive the notification sent by any device.
